attributes.action: Pay for your anti social behaviour  new law
attributes.additional_details:
Every Person cause damage to society has to pay a fine for the police £ 150.- if arrested stay in  take into custody + 150.-
If the ambulance is wanted £ 150.- go to the Hospital you have to pay the full cost.So we save as taxpayer  millions of pounds. So every person think again before bin Anti-social in our society.And stop alcohol advertisin full stop.PUT THE PRIZE HIGH.
